member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFO
member.summary: Contains data used by to identify both an item—in this case as an —and the process that it is associated with.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFO.psi
member.summary: Pointer to an object that represents the object in the Shell namespace.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFO.pszAppID
member.summary: The application-defined AppUserModelID associated with the item.
